alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:54PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marengo County through 900 PM CDT... At 754 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pennington, or 13 miles southwest of Linden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Linden, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Myrtlewood, Freddie Jones Field, Nanafalia, Consul, Magnolia, Wayne, Surginer, Miller, Dixons Mill, Half Acre, Carleys, Octagon and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central, central and southwestern Alabama.
